name: Basic Life Support Certification
description: This badge certifies competency in essential lifesaving skills per international standards. Recipients have demonstrated proficiency in CPR, AED use, and management of choking emergencies for adults, children, and infants in clinical and community settings.

criteria.narrative: Successful completion of: 1) One-rescuer CPR 2) AED operation 3) Relief of choking 4) Bag-mask ventilation 5) Activation of emergency response systems

expires.name: BLS Recertification
expires.description: Valid for 2 years from issuance date
